{"step_by_step_thinking": "OXLUMO (lumasiran) is a medication that is used to treat a rare genetic disorder called primary hyperoxaluria type 1 (PH1). This condition leads to the overproduction of a substance called oxalate, which can lead to kidney stones and kidney failure. OXLUMO works by decreasing the production of oxalate in the body.", "answer_choice": "A. yes"}
